channel.title: Apothis
channel.description:
Apothis, is to be the biggest asteroid in the world, and it it said to hit earth in 2029, i myself dont think it would happen.
I Found this out by looking through youtube ;D
Here is a video of what the world would look like if apopthis would hit.
The japanes made it.
[url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oB3G0rvCIJc]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oB3G0rvCIJc[/url]
Please watch and discuss about it.
P.S dont watch if you dont want to see the world being destroyed =o
